description.value: Youâ€™ve trained with weapons used by your genie ancestors. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Falchion]{Falchions}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Ranseur]{Ranseurs}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Scimitar]{Scimitars}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Trident]{Tridents}. In addition, you gain access to all uncommon geniekin weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial geniekin weapons are simple weapons and advanced geniekin weapons are martial weapons.
